title: Retro Watch
summary: Retro Watch Face for retro lovers! Show time in retro green, red or amber color!
description: ★ Featured by Google!Retro Watch Face for retro lovers! Do you still remember the old computer monitor? This watch face shows time, date and day of weeks in a green, red or amber monitor with 40 columns text!Works with round and square watches. ★ For more fonts and customise text, try Retro Watch Pro!
descriptionHTML:
★ Featured by Google!

Retro Watch Face for retro lovers!

Do you still remember the old computer monitor? This watch face shows time, date and day of weeks in a green, red or amber monitor with 40 columns text!

Works with round and square watches.

★ For more fonts and customise text, try Retro Watch Pro!
comments: Doesn't work Doesn't seem to show up on my watch or Android apps as a face I can use. Moto360
Off center on 360 Just gave the free version an install to see if the text is centered on the Moto 360, but similar to the pro version it's too far to the left side of the watch.
Add fonts? I like it!  Maybe consider using the "GlassTTY" font (from old DEC VT-series terminals) for extra retro-coolness.
Off center The time is off center. Moto 360.
Great Realy cool looking and simple
